other_title: Sailor Moon - Das Mädchen mit den Zauberkräften (German)
美少女戦士セーラームーン (Japanese)
plot: One day, Usagi Tsukino, clumsy 2nd-year middle school student (8th grader), stumbles upon a talking cat named Luna. Luna tells her that she is destined to be Sailor Moon, "champion of love and justice", and she must search for the fabled Moon Princess. Usagi finds friends that turn out to be destined senshi as well, and together they fight to save the world from the certain doom brought upon by the Dark Kingdom (Queen Beryl, the generals, Metallia).
opening_theme: "Sailor Moon Theme" by Nicole Price and Bynne Price
"Sana ay di na Magwakas" by Angelika Dela Cruz
insert_song: "Illusionary Silver Crystal ～ Silver Crystal" (幻の銀水晶～シルバークリスタル; Maboroshi no Gunzuishō～Silver Crystal) by Apple Pie (アップルパイ) (ep 34)
"Tsuki ni Kawatte Oshioki Yo" by Kotono Mitsuishi, Aya Hisakawa and Michie Tomizawa (ep 21)
